backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining authorization, user profiles, character sheet structures, and save/load logic using Map-based persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two numeric‑input behaviors to the frontend files implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions of each component and utility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH color variables plus base styles for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Switches between LoginScreen and StockSheetPage based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/EditableSheetTab: Editable table component handling quantity input editing, validation, 3‑decimal normalization, and commit via ref.
frontend/src/components/FinalCalculation: Displays formatted opening, purchase, sales, suspense, and closing totals.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login UI with Internet Identity sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/SectionCard.tsx: Card wrapper for sheet sections showing title, content, and section total.
frontend/src/components/UserMenu.tsx: User menu with sign‑out logic that clears identity and React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockSheet.ts: Defines hooks for loading, converting, and saving stock sheet data between frontend format and backend CharacterSheet format.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and print-optimized styles, including overrides for layout and colors.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/StockSheetPage.tsx: Implements the main stock sheet UI with editable tables, loading/saving logic, totals calculation, printing, and export.
frontend/src/types/stockSheet.ts: Defines TypeScript types for stock sheet rows, sheets, and table columns.
frontend/src/utils/dateKey.ts: Provides utilities for generating, formatting, parsing, and validating YYYY-MM-DD date keys.
frontend/src/utils/defaultSheetState.ts: Generates default StockSheet structures populated with placeholder items and zero quantities.
frontend/src/utils/exportToExcel.ts: Builds a CSV from stock sheet data and totals, then triggers a client‑side download.
frontend/src/utils/numberFormat.ts: Contains helpers for parsing, validating, formatting, and normalizing numeric input to three decimals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities for clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, issues, and existing features for building a responsive Excel‑style Stock Calculation Sheet web app.
